title: Your Stake in Iowa's Future: What Prospects for Agriculture and Main Street (1961)
creator: WOI-TV
description: This film shows an informal panel discussion regarding the loss of farmers and the impact on towns in Iowa. The program covers opportunities in farming or business and government aid programs. This program originally aired in central Iowa on WOI-TV in Ames, Iowa.
source: Iowa State University Special Collections and University Archives

title: Short course material: Care and management of sheep
creator: Bliss, Ralph K.
description: Handwritten notes and material for the short course on the care and management of sheep. Includes subject matter such as points of the body to inspect and select for, how to feed and shelter the sheep, the care and fattening of lambs, parasite control, and a general summary. Contains six pages of notes.
subject: Agricultural education; Agricultural extension work; Sheep; Animal culture; Iowa State University. University Extension
